sentences.en: An overall theme will help to give your essay coherence.
sentences.cn: 一个总的主题将有助于使文章连贯紧凑。

sentences.en: D high coherence: interferntical field their own spatial distributions and spectral distribution.
sentences.cn: D高相干性: 是由光波场本身的空间分布特性和频谱分布特性所决定的.

sentences.en: Environmental education is intended to give these topics more coherence.
sentences.cn: 环境教育的目的是使这些课题更加息息相关.

sentences.en: He had a coherence of outlook and thought.
sentences.cn: 他的观点和想法条理清晰。

sentences.en: I'm mad, without sense or coherence tonight.
In a computer network, this coherence, model, and software are absent.
sentences.cn: 在计算机网络, 不存在这样的连贯性 、 模型和软件.

sentences.en: Only the Method could have guided me to this center of coherence.
sentences.cn: 只有“方法”才能指引我来到这连绵书脉的中心.

sentences.en: The anthology has a surprising sense of coherence.
sentences.cn: 整本选集有着惊人的连贯性。

sentences.en: The campaign was widely criticised for making tactical mistakes and for a lack of coherence.
sentences.cn: 竞选运动由于犯了战术性错误和缺乏连贯性而广受批评。

sentences.en: The generation of interference frings is then seemingly a very convenient measure of the coherence.
sentences.cn: 于是干涉条纹的产生看来是相干性最方便的量度.

sentences.en: The internationalization of terms refers to the export and coherence of terms.
sentences.cn: 术语国际化有两重含义:术语输出和术语一致.

sentences.en: The murmur trembled on the verge of coherence, sank down, mounted excitedly, and then ceased altogether.
sentences.cn: 喃喃的话语声几次接近听得真的程度, 降低卜去,又激动地高上去, 然后完全终止.

sentences.en: The points you make are fine, but the whole essay lacks coherence.
sentences.cn: 你提出的论点很好，但整篇文章缺乏呼应连贯。

sentences.en: Thereafter, I adhered to the coherence inherent to the theory.
sentences.cn: 此后, 我粘对理论固有的连贯性.

sentences.en: This article lacks unity and coherence.
To give my story coherence I should describe the progress of their tragic union.
sentences.cn: 为了把我的故事说得有头有尾,我应该描写一下他们这一悲剧性的结合是如何发展的.

sentences.en: We will get back to these ideas when we consider coherence theory in more detail.
sentences.cn: 我们在后面比较详细地讨论相干性理论时,再回到这些概念上来.

words.tran_cn: 连贯的，一致的；明了的；清晰的；凝聚性的；互相偶合的；粘在一起的
连贯地；前后一致地；条理清楚地；互相偶合地；凝聚性地
凝聚；结合；[力] 内聚力

phrases.tran_cn: 相位相干性；相位同调性

trans.tran_en: when something such as a piece of writing is easy to understand because its parts are connected in a clear and reasonable way
